questions.question: Which of the following is an example of a best practice from the operational excellence pillar of the AWS Well-Architected Framework?
options: Deploying machine learning (ML) models to multiple Availability Zones to prevent outages in the event of failure in one Availability Zone
Implementing an encryption strategy on you training data while in storage
Choosing the most energy-efficient Amazon EC2 instances for model training jobs
Using a repeatable process to deploy machine learning (ML) models
correct_answers: Using a repeatable process to deploy machine learning (ML) models
